title: The AI Scrum Master: Using Large Language Models (LLMs) to Automate Agile Project Management Tasks
abstract: Abstract There is a high demand across industries for intelligent devices to automate and optimize processes. Generative AI has soared in popularity and it is the first AI technology to be used by everyone. It is already automating junior-level office work, as well as highly complex creative tasks. This paper studies how Generative AI can automate some of the Agile project management tasks, such as reporting and creating requirements that correctly cover the scope.
